titleNullable: Masked Face Detection In the Wild dataset
subtitleNullable: WIDER Face data subset of Clear and Occluded/Masked faces
descriptionNullable:
### Context

COVID-19

### Content

The dataset contains 12,941 training and 3,287 validation images containing wide variety of faces with no/partial/heavy occlusion on 62 diverse scenarios.



### Acknowledgements

WIDER Face Dataset

### Inspiration

Mask4All
